channel.title: Microsoft 365 community on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 community on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: PnP WatchParty for Microsoft's 'LearnTogether Building apps with Microsoft Graph' event
item.description: The Microsoft 365 PnP Team would love to invite you to the Watch Party that we are hosting for the Learn Together: Building apps with Microsoft Graph event.

item.title: Powerful Devs Conference Sept 14th
item.description: Want to learn about how to leverage Fusion Teams and the Power Platform to build applications faster and with less code?

item.title: Updates on the Microsoft 365 platform community calls
item.description: We have been hosting different set of Microsoft 365 community calls since 2015 where we share the latest news and do live demos on the different capabilities in Microsoft 365.
